Element.name: InclusiveGateway
Element.Description: An <a href="/Concepts/Elements/Process/Gateways/InclusiveGateway"/> represents a branching point where Alternatives are based on conditional expressions contained within outgoing Sequence Flow. However, in this case, the True evaluation of one Activation Expression does not exclude the evaluation of other Activation Expressions.
Element.Action: Change this gateway to a different gateway.
